name: Arrival of Beasts
storyline: The beasts overwhelmed the world and you are the last hope to fight them back by killing the final spawner. Defend your base on every map to clear areas. Collect experience and skillpoints to increase your power. Choose your main path military, economy or special to refine your strategical gameplay and buy / upgrade / unlock tons of useful stuff. Collect beastcards to study every special ability and all the attributes of them. Grind maps to get more progress on the main storyline while ranking up in the online leaderboard. Create teams to climb up the team leaderboard together.
summary: Arrival of Beasts is a simple made tower defense game with complex strategic rogue-like, grinding, crafting, build and contest elements. Also with some online competition / teamwork and Co-Op action. It offers tons of play hours and individual playstyles if you like the genre and art style. Remember: The game is made by one person.
